CustomField.formula: IF( OR(AND(TEXT(FS_Scheduled_Install_Date__c) = '',FS_Pending_for_Reschedule__c),(TEXT(FS_Original_Install_Date__c) = '')) , 'Pending',IF( AND(TEXT(FS_Original_Install_Date__c) != '', NOT (FS_Install_Complete__c)) , 'Scheduled', IF( FS_Install_Complete__c , 'Complete', '')))
CustomField.label: Installation Status
